thread.title: Lamar Odom reportedly improving, transferred to Los Angeles hospital
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom reportedly improving, transferred to Los Angeles hospital

title: Lamar Odom reportedly improving, transferred to Los Angeles hospital
text:
A representative for Odom's aunt, JaNean Mercer, told The Associated Press that Odom is alert and improving. He is undergoing physical therapy and likely will try to walk soon, according to the Los Angeles Daily News . 
"Each day, Lamar is getting stronger and reaching significant milestones in his recovery," Mercer said . 
Odom, estranged husband of Khloe Kardashian, regained consciousness Friday – three days after he was hospitalized – and has been breathing "without a tube" since, ESPN reports. Family members, including Khloe and other stars of E!'s "Keeping Up With the Kardashians," have been at his bedside. 
Meanwhile, officials continued to investigate Odom's $75,000 visit to the Love Ranch. Dennis Hof, the brothel's owner, told the AP that staffers brought Odom there last Saturday because he "wanted to get away, have a good time and relax." Odom had workers sign "confidentiality agreements" regarding the visit, Hof said . 
Odom told employees that he had taken cocaine before his arrival at the ranch, according to the AP . Odom did not appear to be taking any illegal drugs at the brothel, but he was seen drinking Cognac and taking "herbal Viagra" called Reload 72-Hour Strong , Hof said.
